title: The Gibbering
description: The psyker screams as unreality floods his mind.
effect: Psyker is Stunned for 1d5 rounds.

title: Warp Burn
description: Warp energy sears the psyker's body.
effect: Psyker takes 1d10 Energy damage (ignoring armour and Toughness).

title: Psychic Concussion
description: A wave of force blasts outward.
effect: Everyone within 3d10 metres is knocked Prone. Psyker is Stunned for 1d5 rounds.

title: Psy Drain
description: The psyker's connection to the warp weakens.
effect: Psyker cannot use powers for 1d5 rounds.

title: Blood Rain
description: Blood drizzles from the sky or ceiling within 3d10 metres.
effect: Causes Fear (1) test for all within range.

title: Haunted
description: Shadows lengthen and twist, whispering dark secrets.
effect: Psyker gains 1d10 Insanity Points.

title: Hellish Visions
description: Everyone within 2d10 metres sees nightmarish visions.
effect: WP test or Stunned for 1d5 rounds. All gain 1d5 Insanity.

title: Dark Summoning
description: Warp entities take notice.
effect: A hostile daemon is summoned nearby (GM determines specifics).

title: Warp Madness
description: The psyker is overcome by the warp.
effect: Psyker gains 2d10 Insanity Points and is Stunned for 1d10 rounds.

title: Psychic Storm
description: Lightning arcs from the psyker.
effect: Everyone within 1d10 metres takes 1d10 Energy damage.

title: Soul Sear
description: The psyker's soul is scorched by warp fire.
effect: Psyker takes 2d10 Energy damage (ignoring armour and TB) and gains 2d10 Insanity Points.

title: Cataclysmic Blast
description: An explosion of warp energy erupts from the psyker.
effect: Everyone within 2d10 metres takes 2d10 Energy damage. Psyker takes double.

title: Mass Possession
description: Everyone nearby is assaulted by warp entities.
effect: WP test for everyone within 10 metres or gain 2d10 Insanity. On 3+ DoF, possessed for 1d10 rounds.

title: Reality Quake
description: Reality fractures and reforms.
effect: All within 5d10m are hurled 1d10m in a random direction. Agility test or take 1d10 Impact damage and fall Prone.

title: Warp Vortex
description: A swirling vortex of warp energy appears.
effect: Toughness test or take 3d10 Energy damage (ignoring AP). All within 5m are dragged 1d10m toward vortex.
damage: 3d10 Energy (ignore AP) on failed T test

title: Chronological Incontinence
description: Time distorts violently.
effect: Everyone within 2d10m ages or de-ages 1d10 years. Psyker is displaced out of time for 1d10 rounds.

title: Rending the Veil
description: The barrier between reality and the Warp tears open.
effect: Warp rift opens for 1d5 rounds. All within range must test WP each round or gain 1d10 Insanity.

title: Burning Body
description: The psyker bursts into warp flame.
effect: Psyker takes 3d10 Energy damage (ignoring AP+TB) and catches fire. All within 2m take 1d10 Energy damage.

title: The Black Gate
description: A gate to the warp yawns open.
effect: A Greater Daemon is summoned. The psyker must pass a WP (-30) test or be possessed.

title: Annihilation
description: The psyker is consumed utterly.
effect: The psyker is destroyed — body and soul — sucked into the warp. A massive explosion deals 3d10 Energy damage to all within 5d10 metres.
